greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Absolute value of first digit of n minus sum of other digits of n.
comment: This is different from |A055017(n)| = |(x1 + x3 + ...) - (x2 + x4 + ...)|, where x1,...,xk are the digits of n. - _M. F. Hasler_, Nov 09 2019
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: If decimal expansion of n is x1 x2 ... xk then a(n) = |x1-x2-x3- ... -xk|.
program: (Haskell) a040997 n = abs $ a000030 n - a007953 (a217657 n) -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 10 2012
results.author: _Felice Russo_
ext: Name edited and incorrect formula deleted by _M. F. Hasler_, Nov 09 2019
